author: nikoranettie
content: HI all, would like to ask a few questions about the deposit smart contract for phase 0

author: nikoranettie
content: Is there an exit function for users to withdraw ETH if the deposit contract does not have the minimum amount of ETH to activate Phase 0 ?

author: bitfalls
content: No, the contract is supposed to slowly build up to the amount. Otherwise some parties could troll the launch. The new starting amount is much lower than before, reachable by even a single party, so I don't think you need to worry about it
